installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Forge Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk update
apk add curl

if [ -z "$MC_VERSION" ] || [ "$MC_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    INSTALLER_JAR=$(curl -sl http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/ | grep -A50 Recommended | grep installer.jar | grep -Eo "(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*" | tail -1)
    UNIVERSAL_JAR=$(curl -sl http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/ | grep -A50 Recommended | grep universal.jar | grep -Eo "(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*" | tail -1)
else
    INSTALLER_JAR=$(curl -sl http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/index_$MC_VERSION.html | grep -A50 Recommended | grep installer.jar | grep -Eo "(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*" | tail -1)
    UNIVERSAL_JAR=$(curl -sl http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/index_$MC_VERSION.html | grep -A50 Recommended | grep universal.jar | grep -Eo "(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*" | tail -1)
fi

cd /mnt/server

echo -e "getting installer from $INSTALLER_JAR"
curl -Sl $INSTALLER_JAR -o installer.jar

echo -e "getting universal jar from $UNIVERSAL_JAR"
curl -Sl $UNIVERSAL_JAR -o server.jar

java -jar installer.jar --installServer
rm -rf installer.jar

echo "Install complete"
